There is a fine line in this role between trying to attract capital into a small business and being overly optimistic
Likes: and spreading misinformation to “ hype a stock”.  I’m in the former camp where Don’s genuine dedication and commitment to building a new technology to solve a global problem led him to be too optimistic at times. Pump and dump? No way.No one will confuse Don for a Bay Street financial executive. He doesn’t dress the part
column7: or act the part. Rather he is a Founder that needs to bring in more experienced “ business minded” talent to take CMC to the next level. He is starting to do that with recent management changes and a recalibrated Board.. will there be future mistakes? Absolutely! But in building a longer term SUSTAINABLE business
column8: I feel he is putting some of the right building blocks in place. Next will be financing that gives CMC at least 24 months of cash runway.. provably through a combo of convertible debt and government grants/loans. Building this technology at scale will require more capital.. that’s a given.Watching daily ticker will drive anyone insane.. it will bounce around until there is substantive news.. my expectation is we will not hear anything too substantive until early 2022.
